item.title: 伯克希尔增持日本最大贸易公司股份
item.description: 在沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）致股东的年度信函引发有关此举的猜测三周后，伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Berkshire Hathaway Inc. increased its stakes in Japan’s largest trading houses, three weeks after Warren Buffett’s annual letter to shareholders spurred speculation of such move.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市有望实现第四天上涨
Absa 聘请标准银行副首席执行官菲拉（Fihla）担任下一任首席执行官
item.description: 南非 Absa 集团有限公司聘请标准银行集团有限公司副首席执行官 Kenny Fihla 担任下一任总裁。【原文：South Africa’s Absa Group Ltd. hired Kenny Fihla, deputy chief executive officer of Standard Bank Group Ltd., as its next head.】

item.title: 肯尼亚在未能获得 8 亿美元后寻求新的国际货币基金组织计划
item.description: 肯尼亚在同意不对本可释放 8 亿美元的现有贷款机制进行最后审查后，向国际货币基金组织申请了一项新的融资计划。【原文：Kenya requested a new funding program from the International Monetary Fund after agreeing not to proceed with a final review of an existing facility that would have unlocked $800 million.】

item.title: Investcorp 同意收购德国 Miebach 公司的大部分股份
item.description: Investcorp 同意收购德国供应链和物流咨询公司 Miebach Logistik Holding GmbH 的多数股权，这是该公司在过去 15 个月中在欧洲进行的第五笔私募股权投资。【原文：Investcorp agreed to acquire a majority stake in German supply chain and logistics consultancy firm Miebach Logistik Holding GmbH, marking its fifth private equity investment in Europe in the past 15 months.】

item.title: 中国股市走强，新兴市场股市将创九月以来最佳表现
item.description: 随着中国股市在更多财政措施的推动下出现反弹，新兴市场股市将延续六个月来的最佳月度表现。【原文：Emerging market equities are set to extend their best monthly performance in six months as a rebound in Chinese shares gain momentum on more fiscal measures.】

item.title: 黑格塞斯放弃韩国之行，领导层真空造成影响
item.description: 韩国总统尹锡烈宣布戒严令后，韩国政局持续动荡，国防部长皮特-黑格塞斯（Pete Hegseth）将他一直期待的首尔之行推迟到本月。【原文：Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth has pushed back a Seoul visit he has been eyeing for as early as this month as political uncertainty continues in South Korea after President Yoon Suk Yeol’s shock martial law declaration.】

item.title: 印尼大型建筑商 Wijaya Karya 未能偿还当地债券
item.description: 陷入困境的印尼国有建筑商 PT Wijaya Karya 未能偿还两张印尼盾票据的未偿还本金，这是一个新的信号，表明印尼建筑业仍在为长达十年之久的基础设施建设带来的财务后果而苦恼。【原文：Troubled Indonesian state-owned builder PT Wijaya Karya failed to repay the outstanding principals of two rupiah-denominated notes, a fresh signal that the country’s construction sector is still reeling from the financial consequences of a decade-long infrastructure push.】

item.title: 美国式出售家族银器
item.description:
为美国主权财富基金提供资金的最简单方法可能是大规模出售联邦资源。【原文：

The easiest way to finance a US sovereign wealth fund could be through a massive sale of federal resources.

】

item.title: 爱尔兰从减肥药中获利引起特朗普关注
item.description:
爱尔兰政府在圣帕特里克节发起外交攻势，试图平息特朗普对 "巨额 "贸易顺差的愤怒。【原文：

Irish government mounts a St. Patrick’s Day diplomatic offensive to try and calm Trump anger at ‘massive’ trade surplus.   

】

item.title: 瑞士因宽松空间有限而面临降息困境
item.description: 瑞士央行即将做出另一个悬而未决的决定，官员们正在权衡是否要在零利率之前用完最后一次降息。【原文：Switzerland’s central bank is about to take another cliffhanger decision as officials weigh whether to use up one of their last interest-rate cuts before reaching zero.】

item.title: 西班牙中央银行行长表示，数字游民的吸引力正在促进经济发展
item.description: 西班牙央行行长何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（Jose Luis Escriva）表示，由于西班牙对远程工作者的吸引力，西班牙的经济正在得到提振。【原文：Spain’s economy is getting a boost thanks to the country’s attractiveness for remote workers, according to central bank chief Jose Luis Escriva.】

item.title: 民调显示，欧洲央行降息幅度将减小，因为欧洲增加了支出
item.description: 接受彭博社调查的分析师认为，欧洲央行将再降低两次借贷成本，他们预计利率将不再低于 2%。【原文：The European Central Bank will lower borrowing costs two more times, according to analysts surveyed by Bloomberg who no longer expect interest rates to go below 2%.】

item.title: 价格压力重现，英国央行鹰派重回主导地位
item.description: 在中央银行中，一个月是很长的一段时间。随着政策制定者开始担心物价上涨的压力，预计英格兰银行本周将做出自 9 月份以来最鹰派的决定。【原文：A month is a long time in central banking. The Bank of England is this week expected to deliver its most hawkish decision since September as policymakers start to fret about building price pressures.】

item.title: 大众汽车将在中国推出 11 款新车型以夺回市场份额
item.description: 德国大众汽车公司（Volkswagen AG）及其长期合作伙伴一汽集团（FAW Group）将推出 11 款专供中国市场的新车型，以巩固其在全球最大汽车市场不断下滑的市场份额。【原文：Volkswagen AG and its long-standing partner FAW Group will launch 11 new models exclusively for the Chinese market as it seeks to shore up declining market share in the world’s biggest auto market.】

item.title: 加密货币交易所 OKX 暂停吸引欧盟审查的 DeFi 服务
item.description: 数字资产交易所 OKX 在受到欧洲监管机构的审查后，暂停了一项被黑客用来清洗交易平台 Bybit 上 15 亿美元抢劫所得的服务。【原文：Digital-asset exchange OKX has suspended a service used by hackers to launder proceeds from a $1.5 billion heist on trading platform Bybit, after drawing scrutiny from European watchdogs.】

item.title: 特朗普表示将同时征收互惠和部门关税
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统表示，他将于 4 月 2 日征收广泛的互惠关税和针对特定行业的额外关税。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would be imposing both broad reciprocal tariffs and additional sector-specific tariffs on April 2.】

item.title: 繁荣持续，新加坡房屋销售跃升至三个月新高
item.description: 受当地人寻求郊区住宅和一些人试图快速获利的刺激，2 月份新加坡私人住宅销售攀升至三个月来的最高点。【原文：Singapore private home sales climbed to a three-month high in February, spurred by locals seeking suburban residences and some trying to make a quick profit.】

item.title: 对冲基金削减欧元空头，资产管理公司推升欧元看涨押注
item.description: 欧洲历史性地转向扩大财政支出，刺激资产管理公司将看涨欧元的仓位提高到五个月来的最高点，而对冲基金则减少了对欧元疲软的押注。【原文：Europe’s historic pivot toward bigger fiscal spending has spurred asset managers to pump up bullish euro positions to a five-month high, while hedge funds have pared bets on the currency’s weakness.】

item.title: 香港激进投资者韦伯改变了终止数据库的想法
item.description: 正在与癌症抗争的香港激进投资者大卫-韦伯（David Webb）说，他死后将在 Github 上提供他几十年来建立的在线数据库，供公众访问。【原文：David Webb, the Hong Kong activist investor battling cancer, said he will make his online database built up over decades available for public access on Github after his death.】

item.title: 天气转暖，中国冬季发电量罕见下降
item.description: 由于冬季气温较低，中国的发电量在年初出现了罕见的下降，这给煤炭和天然气等发电厂燃料的价格带来了更大的压力。【原文：China’s electricity output suffered a rare early-year decline amid milder winter temperatures, adding to pressure on prices of power plant fuels like coal and gas.】

item.title: 九一顶级基金买入阿联酋股票以躲避贸易战
item.description: Ninety One Plc.表示，随着对受唐纳德-特朗普贸易战影响较小的投资需求激增，该公司正在购买阿拉伯联合酋长国的股票。【原文：Ninety One Plc. says it’s buying stocks from the United Arab Emirates as demand surges for investments that are less exposed to Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 时装零售商 Forever 21 运营商申请破产
item.description: Forever 21 曾吸引成群结队的年轻女性和女孩前来购买廉价、新潮的服装，但在多年业绩不佳之后，该品牌的美国零售运营商申请破产。【原文：The US retail operator of Forever 21, a brand that once attracted droves of young women and girls to shop for cheap, trendy clothing, filed for bankruptcy after years of poor performance.】

item.title: 随着利率上升，Pimco 从日本债券交易中获利
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Pacific Investment Management Co. funds that held an underweight position on Japanese government bonds are changing their stance as yields march to multi-year highs.】

item.title: 菲律宾顶级金融科技公司 GCash 希望在首次公开募股时获得 10%-15% 的公众持股量
item.description: 菲律宾顶级移动钱包 GCash 背后的公司正在为其计划中的首次公开募股寻求较低的最低公众持股比例，即 10%-15%。【原文：The company behind the Philippines’ top mobile wallet GCash is seeking a lower minimum public float of 10%-15% for its planned initial public offering, a top executive said.】

item.title: 中国计划全球首席执行官下周在北京与习近平会面
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，包括高通公司的克里斯蒂安诺-阿蒙和沙特阿美石油公司的阿明-纳赛尔在内的全球首席执行官将前往北京参加一年一度的高管聚会，其中一些人有望会见习近平主席等最高领导人。【原文：Global CEOs including Qualcomm Inc.’s Cristiano Amon and Saudi Aramco’s Amin Nasser will travel to Beijing for an annual gathering of top executives, people familiar with the matter say, with some expected to meet top leaders like President Xi Jinping.】

item.title: 中国承诺扩大需求后，铜价接近五个月高点
item.description: 在中国誓言重振世界最大金属消费国的消费之后，铜价接近五个月高点。【原文：Copper traded near a five-month high after China vowed to revive consumption in the world’s largest consumer of the metal.】

item.title: 受中国不确定性影响，铁矿石期货从月度高点回落
item.description: 铁矿石下跌，因为中国最新的经济数据凸显了世界第二大经济体今年开局的不平衡，新房价格再次下跌。【原文：Iron ore fell as the latest economic data in China underscored an uneven start to the year for the world’s second-biggest economy, with new home prices falling again.】

item.title: 中国股市在消费计划发布会前踯躅不前
item.description: 中国股市窄幅震荡，投资者在等待新闻发布会的召开，预计官员们将在会上公布有关振兴消费的细节。【原文：Chinese stocks traded in a narrow range as investors awaited a press conference in which officials are expected to announce details about efforts to revive consumption.】

item.title: 印度的 "恐惧指数 "毫无紧张迹象
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】
